name: ij2tpl
description: A Mustache-like Template Engine written in TypeScript(<= 4kB after uglifying).

scripts.build: node update.js && tsc && rollup ij2tpl.js -f umd -n IJ2TPL -o dist/ij2tpl.umd.js && node hacks/es3-compat.js && uglifyjs dist/ij2tpl.umd.js -m -c properties,dead_code,conditionals,comparisons,evaluate,booleans,loops,unused,if_return,join_vars,collapse_vars,reduce_vars,negate_iife,expression,drop_console,passes=3 -o dist/ij2tpl.min.js

author: urain39
